settings.title: Shop Bestsellers
settings.subheading:
There are so many Sunglo models available for any need you might have, including the following: the Sunglo a270, the Sunglo heater a242, and the PSA265. The Sunglo brand has been putting out some of the highest-quality heaters since 1961 when they were invented by Edwin J. Cowan.

The leading heaters in the outdoor radiant heating industry, these heaters are not only powerful, but they’re also beautifully designed. Your guests will be able to enjoy their food and drinks on into the night, no matter the temperature, and they’ll love how the gorgeous designs mesh with your patio’s aesthetic.

Whether you choose a cost-effective natural gas option or go with propane as a fuel source, you’ll be sure to get your money’s worth with these efficient heaters. They’re robust too — their heavy-duty corrosion-resistant construction ensures they’ll stand up to even the toughest weather conditions. Most models are able to withstand winds up to 10 MPH, so even a heavy breeze won’t ruin your guests’ dinner and drinks.

Here are some of Sunglo’s bestsellers.
settings.override_product_description_1: The Sunglo Natural Gas Portable Patio Heater is freestanding and perfect for open patios — it even comes with a floor clamp kit so you can secure it against wind (up to 10 MPH).
settings.override_product_description_2: The Sunglo Natural Gas Permanent Post Patio Heater puts out 50,000 BTUs of heat and brings style and warmth to your patio.
settings.override_product_description_3: The Sunglo Propane Portable Patio Heater will let your guests keep enjoying the night no matter how cold it gets through the quiet radiant heat it puts out.
